item.title: Video Editor and Clipper - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to grow with me. I am currently looking for someone to watch my twitch stream create clips and videos out of it.

You don't have to be good at editing now but I am looking for someone who is trying to improve themselves editing everytime adding something new or trying something.

I am look for them to create 5 short form clips a day and create 1 video a day for me.

As content keeps improving I will increase pay.

item.title: Video Editor Needed for Real Estate Social Media Content 45-60sec - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, I’m looking for a skilled video editor who can create a professional real estate video for social media. I have all the footage ready, including interior shots, drone footage, and other necessary visuals. I will provide some example videos to give you an idea of what I’m looking for.

Requirements:

• Experience in video editing, specifically for social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook
• Ability to create engaging and visually appealing content
• Familiarity with real estate video marketing is a plus
• Proficient in using editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools
• Ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work

Details:

• The footage includes both interior shots and drone footage
• Examples of desired style and format will be provided
• Quick turnaround time required

Examples:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7FEyqDpslY/?igsh=MW0zbmhjZml3emF2bg==
https://shot.with.wyattsmithmedia.com/videos/01903d06-63ca-72cb-92e2-5c3976ff6695


Those are some examples, and I want something similar. I took the videos today, but honestly, for some reason, I was using my 360 camera and the video quality turned out really bad. I don’t know why. So, I don’t have much usable footage. I have some videos, but not a lot. Please try to create something with what I have. The video needs to be between 45 seconds and one minute.




Budget: $40
Posted On: June 28, 2024 01:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Family Reunion Video - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Family Reunion Video/Photo Slideshow Creation
I am seeking a skilled freelancer to create a video/photo slideshow for my upcoming family reunion. The slideshow will feature a little under 200 family pictures and include different background music and headings for each themed section. Themes include "Throwbacks" (old photos), "Celebrations" (birthdays, graduations, etc.), "We Be Trippin'" (trips), and more.

Responsibilities:

Organize and sequence provided photos into themed sections.
Add appropriate background music for each section.
Create and incorporate headings for each theme.
Ensure smooth transitions and professional quality throughout the slideshow.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video/photo editing.
Ability to select and synchronize music with photo themes.
Strong attention to detail and creativity.
Excellent communication skills for any necessary revisions.

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 28, 2024 01:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

Category: Voice Talent

item.title: Lots of short videos warning people not to keep their phone close to their body - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who is creative. I cannot send an example because have not seen any videos like this.

Please please please do not contact me unless you read this description fully and understand what the project is about. It is NOT a cash cow or whatever!

No AI, no stock footage. Real movie clips and real music.

Idea is to have lots of short videos, not shorts and lots of YouTube channels, maybe with just 1 video

Example of 1 video title is,' Can my phone hurt me?'

Video opens with a movie clip of people saying yes yes yes

Brief text explaining why and how, Voice-over after giving people time to read the text.

End video with some music

Every video will have the same explanatory text and links to campaigning websites

Idea is the videos are shocking, dramatic and with a touch of humour.

It's a controversial topic; I have spent the last 2 years researching it and this has been traumatising finding out the real truth.

Man made electromagnetic radiation is not as safe as the lying industry and their pet scientist would have people believe. There are over 2000 solid, peer-reviewed studies clearly showing harmful biological effects for every living organism on our planet. Regulatory authorities completely ignore this research. Never in the history of science has so much evidence been Ignored and dismissed .
The Environmental Health Trust sued the FCC for ignoring scientific research showing harmful effects including cancer and they won the case. The judge rebuked the FCC for not considering all of the available research and told them to do that but so far they have not.

Please check out the Environmental Health Trust website to give you a good background of the project. The videos on it are usually too long, they speak while showing text and or they are too scientific for the man in the street.

The main objective is to wake people up that their phones are not completely safe and to advise them not to keep the phone close to their body. There has been a dramatic rise in cancers among younger people.

Thanks for reading this far. Please do not contact me with information about how good you are, what programs you use, I haven't got a clue anyway.

Please contact me if you looked at the website and want to change what is happening . Thank you.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 01:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Nonfiction, Documentary, M4V, Elearning Video, Video Production
Skills: Nonfiction, Documentary, M4V, Elearning Video, Video Production
Country: Thailand
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Short Form Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor proficient in Adobe Premiere to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience editing Short Form content, including Reels, Youtube Shorts, and other engaging video formats. As a video editor, you will be responsible for transforming raw footage into compelling videos, using your creativity and technical expertise. The ability to work efficiently, meet deadlines, and collaborate effectively with other team members is essential. If you have a keen eye for detail, excellent storytelling skills, and a passion for creating visually stunning videos, we want to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere
- Strong knowledge of video editing techniques
- Creativity and attention to detail
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Hourly Range: $9.00-$25.00

item.title: 3D Animator/VFX Artist - Upwork
item.description:
LOOKING FOR LONG TERM TALENTED 3D Animator/VFX Artist for Integrating Shower Filters into Iconic Locations and creating iconic content with us.

Description:

We are seeking a talented 3D animator/VFX artist to create visually stunning effects for our promotional video. The project involves using real stock footage of iconic locations such as the Sydney Harbour Bridge, London, Surfers Paradise, and Melbourne, and making it appear as if our shower filters are landing in the water or present in these locations.

Responsibilities:

Integrate 3D models of shower filters into real stock footage.
Ensure seamless blending of 3D elements with live-action footage.
Use motion tracking to match movements accurately.
Apply realistic rendering, lighting, and texturing.
Collaborate on creative direction and storyboard creation.
Edit and finalise the video to ensure high-quality output.
Skills Required:

3D Animation
Visual Effects (VFX)
Motion Graphics
Video Editing
3D Modeling
After Effects
Blender
Maya
Cinema 4D
Compositing
Adobe Premiere Pro
Final Cut Pro
Realistic Rendering
Stock Footage Integration
Match Moving / Motion Tracking
Special Effects
Lighting and Texturing
Creative Direction
Storyboard Creation
Post-Production
Preferred Qualifications:

Proven experience in 3D animation and VFX.
Strong portfolio showcasing similar projects.
Excellent attention to detail and creativity.
Ability to meet deadlines and work collaboratively.

How to Apply:

Please submit your portfolio along with a brief description of your relevant experience. Include your rate and estimated turnaround time. We look forward to seeing your creative work!

EXAMPLE OF WORK - https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6-0wsVyLqT/?igsh=NHJ0bTV3eG1nNTE1

https://www.instagram.com/p/C7_0vRzivly/?hl=en

https://www.instagram.com/p/Cx8J4SMi6Gc/?hl=en

https://www.instagram.com/p/CumdU59gkWE/?hl=en




Posted On: June 28, 2024 01:16 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:3D Animation, Maxon Cinema 4D, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, 3D Modeling, Rendering, 3D Product Rendering
Skills: 3D Animation, Maxon Cinema 4D, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, 3D Modeling, Rendering, 3D Product Rendering
Country: Australia

item.title: Video Editor - Quick and Affordable - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a video editor who can work quickly and provide affordable services. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing various types of videos and be proficient in using editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Attention to detail and the ability to work under tight deadlines are essential. The editor should be able to enhance video quality, add special effects, transitions, and incorporate audio elements effectively. Good communication skills and the ability to understand client requirements are also important.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Communication

This is a small-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor who can deliver high-quality work on time.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 01:12 UTC

We are in need of a video editor who can work quickly and provide affordable services. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing various types of videos and be proficient in using editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Attention to detail and the ability to work under tight deadlines are essential. The editor should be able to enhance video quality, add special effects, transitions, and incorporate audio elements effectively. Good communication skills and the ability to understand client requirements are also important.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Communication

This is a small-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an intermediate level video editor who can deliver high-quality work on time.

item.description:
We are seeking a talented video creator to produce talking to camera videos on various topics for our social media platforms. The ideal candidate will have a strong presence on camera, excellent communication skills, and the ability to engage with the audience. This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about creating compelling video content and has experience in social media marketing.

Responsibilities:
- Create talking to camera videos based on provided topics
- Ensure high-quality video production, including clear audio and visuals
- Edit videos to optimize content for social media platforms

Requirements:
- Proficient in video production and editing
- Strong on-camera presence and communication skills
- Knowledge of social media platforms and trends
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

If you are a creative individual with a knack for video creation and a passion for social media, we would love to hear from you.
